projects.name: HomeLab Server
projects.description: Actually this is kinda just a private project that i conducted for fun only. this server was based on debian and it was running openmediavault. it also serve as AirPlay server, SpotifyServer, and a ZerotierNode

projects.name: Windows 11 on NABU
projects.description: Nabu was actually a codename for Xiaomi Pad 5, and i was able to install windows 11 on it. it was a fun project to do, and i was able to use it as a daily driver. i dualbooted the windows with some custom android named 'EvolutionX' and it was a pretty smooth os

projects.name: University Search
projects.description: Simple university fetcher (search by country name). using a simple ajax fetching and a free api service

projects.name: Tw*tter clone
projects.description: A website that was trying to clone tw*ter's ui, made using python Flask

projects.name: Kivy Paint App
projects.description: This implementation of a Kivy paint app was created using Python and the Kivy framework. It provides a user-friendly interface and a range of tools to help you create digital art.

projects.name: A Bit Racey
projects.description: made with pygame, The objective of the game is to navigate a character through a series of obstacles and enemies, collecting coins along the way. The character can move left and right, jump, and attack enemies with a sword.

projects.name: Star Shooter
projects.description: made with pygame, The objective of the game is to navigate a spaceship through a field of enemies and asteroids, shooting them down while avoiding their attacks. The player can move the spaceship in any direction and fire lasers to destroy enemies.

projects.name: Flappy Bird
projects.description: Made with pygame, just a normal pygame. The objective of the game is to navigate a bird through a series of pipes without touching them. The bird automatically moves forward and the player must tap the spacebar to flap its wings and gain altitude.

projects.name: To Do List
projects.description: also just a small project. just a normal to do list

projects.name: Warehouse App
projects.description: As mentioned, this is a warehouse journaling app. feauturing exporting datas to excel automatically using CSV. also have the pdf and sending functionality. this is actually my last project in middle school

projects.name: Contact App
projects.description: Second project, this is just a small project of making a phonebook/contact app

projects.name: Cashier App
projects.description: First project, made in 8grade. this was a cashier app made with python tkinter, it feautures making a pdf invoice and send it trough email
